title: Hawkwind - Space Ritual 1973 / 2007 Remaster
description:
Hawkwind were at the height of their powers when they recorded the live album  The Space Ritual / Alive in Liverpool and London.

Released in May 1973, Space Ritual is a unique piece of British music history. It delivers one of the most mind-bending, trance-inducing and flat-out immersive experiences available for your ears and brain. Any band following in the space rock tradition must bow down before it, and in the interests of cosmic justice, so should the arbiters of the critical consensus, and finally recognise Space Ritual as one of the major works of the 1970s.

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s one hell of a trip and certainly the finest heavy psychedelic album produced in the U.K.. 



Hawkwind

Recorded live at Liverpool Stadium on 22nd December 1972 and at Brixton Sundown on 30th December 1972
